00019 #ifndef _FFT_RESULT_FSK_STRENGTH_HPP_cm101118_
00020 #define _FFT_RESULT_FSK_PEAK_STRENGTH_cm101118_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00031 #include "FFTProcessor/Result.hpp"
00032 
00033 namespace Result {
00034   class FFTResultFSKStrength : public Base {
00035   public:
00036     typedef boost::shared_ptr<FFTResultFSKStrength> sptr;
00037     typedef boost::shared_ptr<FFTResultFSKStrength> Handle;
00038     typedef frequency_vector<double> PowerSpectrum;
00039     FFTResultFSKStrength(ptime time,
00040                          Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle peakRef,
00041                          Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle peakShift,
00042                          Result::SpectrumPowerInInterval::Handle noise)
00043       : Base("FFTResultFSKStrength", time)
00044       , peakRef_(peakRef) 
00045       , peakShift_(peakShift) 
00046       , noise_(noise)
00047       , strength_dBm_(20.*std::log10(  std::pow(10., peakRef_->strength()  /20.)
00048                                      + std::pow(10., peakShift_->strength()/20.)))
00049       , ratio_dB_(strength_dBm_ - noise_->strength()) {}
00050 
00051     virtual ~FFTResultFSKStrength() {}
00052     virtual std::string toString() const { 
00053       std::stringstream ss; 
00054       ss << Base::toString() 
00055          << " fReference="     << peakRef_->fReference()
00056          << " fShift="         << peakShift_->fReference()
00057          << " fMeasuredRef="   << peakRef_->fMeasured()
00058          << " fMeasuredShift=" << peakShift_->fMeasured()
00059          << " strength="       << strength_dBm_
00060          << " strengthRef="    << peakRef_->strength()
00061          << " strengthShift="  << peakShift_->strength()
00062          << " noise="          << noise_->strength()
00063          << " ratio="          << ratio_dB_;
00064       return ss.str();
00065     }
00066     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00067       Base::dump_header(os);
00068       return os
00069         << "fReference_Hz fShift_Hz fMeasuredRef_Hz fMeasuredShift_Hz "
00070         << "strength_dBm strengthRef_dBm strengthShift_dBm S/N_dB ";
00071     }
00072     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00073       Base::dump_data(os);
00074       return os
00075         << boost::format("%12.3f") % peakRef_->fReference() << " "
00076         << boost::format("%12.3f") % peakShift_->fReference() << " "
00077         << boost::format("%12.3f") % peakRef_->fMeasured() << " "
00078         << boost::format("%12.3f") % peakShift_->fMeasured() << " "
00079         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % strength_dBm_ << " "
00080         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % peakRef_->strength() << " "
00081         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % peakShift_->strength() << " "
00082         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % ratio_dB_ << " ";
00083     }
00084 
00085   private:
00086     const Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle peakRef_;
00087     const Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle peakShift_;
00088     const Result::SpectrumPowerInInterval::Handle noise_;
00089     const double strength_dBm_;
00090     const double ratio_dB_;
00091   } ;
00092 } // namespace Result
00093 
00094 #endif // _FFT_RESULT_FSK_PEAK_STRENGTH_cm101118_
